subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Phillies rewarded Cole Hamels with a six-year contract. The Marlins traded Hanley Ramirez and reliever Randy Choate to the Dodgers.
snippet: The Phillies rewarded Cole Hamels with a six-year contract. The Marlins traded Hanley Ramirez and reliever Randy Choate to the Dodgers.
